COLORSYNC.DISPLAYSERVICES(8) System Manager's Manual COLORSYNC.DISPLAYSERVICES(8)

NAME

colorsync.displayservices — ColorSync Display Services

SYNOPSIS

colorsync.displayservices

DESCRIPTION

colorsync.displayservices provides services for SkyLight framework (WindowServer) and loginwindow.

There are no configuration options for the colorsync.displayservices agent. One should not run colorsync.displayservices manually.

November 17, 2017 Mac OS X
